titleStmt.title: The tragicomoedi of the vertuous Octauia. Done by Samuel Brandon. 1598
Virtuous Octavia
titleStmt.author: Brandon, Samuel, fl. 1598.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Ponsonbye, and are to be soulde at his shop in S. Paules Churchyarde,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The tragicomœdie of the vertuous Octauia.
Reproduction of the original in Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: his shop in S. Paules Churchyarde
